clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of the Dosing Regimen of Vancomycin in Pediatric Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the Dosing Regimen of Vancomycin in Pediatric Patients

brief_summary.textblock: In this retrospective registry the investigators wish to verify whether the current dosing regime of vancomycin is leading to the appropriate pharmacokinetic targets in pediatric patients. Therefore data will be collected from all pediatric patients hospitalized in University Hospitals Leuven between January 2012 and April 2014 who were treated with vancomycine.

detailed_description.textblock: In this retrospective registry the investigators wish to verify whether the current dosing regime of vancomycin is leading to the appropriate pharmacokinetic targets in pediatric patients. Therefore data will be collected from all pediatric patients hospitalized in University Hospitals Leuven between January 2012 and April 2014 who were treated with vancomycine. Patient files will be screened for relevant information. Individual patients can be included multiple times if vancomycin has been administered more than once.
